mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.app_id AS "appId", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.if_install AS "ifInstall", a.num AS "num", a.contacts_name AS "contactsName", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.address AS "address"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM so_apply_deliver_dtl a WHERE a.app_id = #{appId} ORDER BY a.line_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO so_apply_deliver_dtl( id, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, app_id, order_no, line_no, if_install, num, contacts_name, telephone, address ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{appId}, #{orderNo}, #{lineNo}, #{ifInstall}, #{num}, #{contactsName}, #{telephone}, #{address} )
mapper.update: UPDATE so_apply_deliver_dtl SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, app_id = #{appId}, order_no = #{orderNo}, line_no = #{lineNo}, if_install = #{ifInstall}, num = #{num}, contacts_name = #{contactsName}, telephone = #{telephone}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
